guiSET.core

Class Switch

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiSET.core.Control
      • guiSET.core.TextBased
        • guiSET.core.Checkbox
          • guiSET.core.Switch

  • public class Switch
extends Checkbox
    Switch class derived from Checkbox that looks more like an android switch and has a toggel animation.
    Author:
    Mc-Zen
